docs.snippet: Brazil's embarrassing 7-1 defeat by Germany in the World Cup semi-final has prompted much soul searching in the host nation and calls are mounting for wholesale changes in Brazil's notoriously chaotic domestic game....
docs.lead_paragraph: Brazil's embarrassing 7-1 defeat by Germany in the World Cup semi-final has prompted much soul searching in the host nation and calls are mounting for wholesale changes in Brazil's notoriously chaotic domestic game.

headline.main: Brazil Humbling Prompts Calls for Reform of Domestic Game
headline.print_headline: Brazil Humbling Prompts Calls for Reform of Domestic Game

docs.snippet: The New England Patriots will turn over hundreds of pages of personnel records to lawyers for former tight end Aaron Hernandez but object to producing scouting reports and a psychological assessment, a team lawyer said Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The New England Patriots will turn over hundreds of pages of personnel records to lawyers for former tight end Aaron Hernandez but object to producing scouting reports and a psychological assessment, a team lawyer said Wednesday.

headline.main: Hernandez's Lawyers, Patriots Fight Over Records
headline.print_headline: Hernandez's Lawyers, Patriots Fight Over Records

docs.snippet: Germans awoke on Wednesday to discover the 7-1 demolition of Brazil in their World Cup semifinal was not a delightful dream but a scarcely believable reality....

docs.snippet: All Times EDTFriday, July 11AUTO RACING11:30 a.m....

Russia, which is hosting the next football World Cup in 2018, will relax its ban on beer advertising until after the event, giving a boost to brewers including Anheuser-Busch InBev, whose Budweiser is the official beer of the tournament....
docs.lead_paragraph: Russia, which is hosting the next football World Cup in 2018, will relax its ban on beer advertising until after the event, giving a boost to brewers including Anheuser-Busch InBev, whose Budweiser is the official beer of the tournament.

headline.main: Russia to Allow Beer Adverts Until After 2018 World Cup
headline.print_headline: Russia to Allow Beer Adverts Until After 2018 World Cup

docs.snippet: The three teams that will fall can console themselves with this reflection: They were just as good as the winner....

headline.main: Why World Cup Final Is Too Close to Call

docs.snippet: NCAA President Mark Emmert told a Senate committee Wednesday he supports "scholarships for life" and other reforms in how athletes are treated, then did such a good job of casting himself as a powerless figurehead that one senator told him: "I can...
docs.lead_paragraph: NCAA President Mark Emmert told a Senate committee Wednesday he supports "scholarships for life" and other reforms in how athletes are treated, then did such a good job of casting himself as a powerless figurehead that one senator told him: "I can't tell whether you're in charge or whether you're a minion."

headline.main: NCAA President Calls for 'Scholarships for Life'
headline.print_headline: NCAA President Calls for 'Scholarships for Life'

docs.snippet: The Wallabies' emphatic 3-0 series win over France last month might convey the impression that all is rosy in rugby Down Under but the game's power-brokers fear a quickening player drain could bring the code to its knees....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Wallabies' emphatic 3-0 series win over France last month might convey the impression that all is rosy in rugby Down Under but the game's power-brokers fear a quickening player drain could bring the code to its knees.

headline.main: Player Drain Has Wallabies on the Hop
headline.print_headline: Player Drain Has Wallabies on the Hop

docs.snippet: German media savored the national soccer team's unprecedented 7-1 semi-final victory over World Cup hosts Brazil on Wednesday, describing the rout as a sensation and a miracle and - even though the final is yet to come - its players as immortal....
docs.lead_paragraph: German media savored the national soccer team's unprecedented 7-1 semi-final victory over World Cup hosts Brazil on Wednesday, describing the rout as a sensation and a miracle and - even though the final is yet to come - its players as immortal.

headline.main: German Media Glories in Historic Rout of Brazil
headline.print_headline: German Media Glories in Historic Rout of Brazil
